title: Persistent MFA Encryption Key Management
details: Similar to SECRET_KEY, the MFA_ENCRYPTION_KEY (if provided) or its derived fallback should be consistent. Currently, if MFA_ENCRYPTION_KEY is not set, it derives from SECRET_KEY, which is now persistent. However, if a dedicated MFA_ENCRYPTION_KEY is provided via ENV, it's fine. If we want to allow a persistent dedicated key file, we should implement logic similar to secret_key.
